name: Blind Leadership
description:
Guide your hearts to their destination while steering them away from danger! Challenge your thinking skills to solve various puzzles and test your reflexes to quickly move your hearts out of danger before they blindly walk into despair.

Your game progressed is saved even after closing the game page!

This game was made during Brackey's Game Jam #2!

Controls : 

WASDMovementSpacebarPick up / Put downRRestart level
